item.title: Books
item.description: I’ll link to some books here. The good stuff.

item.title: Music I'm Listening To
item.description: I try to listen to new music every day. It’s kind of insane but I keep a spreadsheet of albums I’m tryna listen to, and a script picks a new one for me every morning. I’m working on a spreadsheet for the new year (switching to google sheets); I’ll link it here when it’s ready (idk when).

item.title: People
item.description: I’ll link to other people’s websites here. I’m taking inspiration from webrings on this page.
